Blacknightmare:

The femme pick up a message and she answered it "I'm outsi=
de base, or the place that used to be our base, 10 miles north"
  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: robert riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Sunday, July 10, 2005 1:19 AM
  Subject: Re: Blacknightmare


  Megat=
ron Revived:

  After hearing the news of bots being found in the mining re=
gion, Megatron deployed himself to maintain a security issue.  He made his =
way stealthily to the old base and landed sveral hundred meters away.  He f=
ley in robot mode toward the base and waited for a moment where he was sure=
 it was deserted and aimed a comm message at the base alone.

  "Blacknight=
mare, this is Megatron.  Are you there?"

  Airly <airly2002@...> w=
rote:
    Blacknightmare:

    The femme dificulty left the remains of Maxi=
mal base, and she moved in the opposite side of the groups of bots were, sh=
e didn't knopw if they were hostiles or not and she ddin't like to take the=
 risk. Hopefully she wouldn't be noticed, she hadn't in condition to start =
a fight



  "HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill=
!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!"
